Bolsonaro: Najgore tek sledi

04 Nov 2019, 07:25












Ekstremno desničarski predsednik Brazila Žair Bolsonaro upozorio je da "najgore tek sledi" u priči o misterioznoj naftnoj mrlji koja je u poslednja tri meseca kontaminirala više od 200 plaža na severoistoku Brazila."Ono što se do sada dogodilo i što je pokupljeno je mali deo onoga što je iscurelo. Najgore tek dolazi", rekao je Bolsonaro u televizijskom intervjuu.Prema njegovim rečima, "sve upućuje" na grčki tanker "Bubulina" koji su brazilske vlasti u petak optužile da je odgovoran za ekološku katastrofu. Kompanija čiji je tanker je odbacila te navode.Bolsonaro je naveo da se radi o "kriminalnom" činu, kao i da se očekuje "mnogo veća katastrofa".Brazilske vlasti su 29. jula otkrile izlivenu naftu na više od 700 kilometara od obale savezne države Paraiba. Nafta se 30. avgusta pojavila na brazilskim plažama i do sada je stigla do države Baija.Pogodjeno je oko 2.000 kilometara obale, uključujući i region Abroljos, utočište grbavih kitova i dom u svetu jedinstvenih koralnih grebena.

Bolsonaro: The worst is yet to come

04 Nov 2019, 07:25












Extremely right-wing Brazilian President Gair Bolsonaro warned that "the worst is yet to come" in the story of a mysterious oil spill that has contaminated more than 200 beaches in northeastern Brazil in the last three months. The worst is yet to come, "Bolsonaro said in a television interview. According to him," everything is pointing "to the Greek oil tanker Bubulin, who was accused by the Brazilian authorities on Friday of being responsible for the environmental disaster. The company whose tanker denied the allegations.Bolsonaro said it was a "criminal" act and that a "much bigger catastrophe" was expected. Brazilian authorities discovered oil spill more than 700 kilometers off the coast of the state on July 29 Paraiba. Oil appeared on Brazil's beaches on August 30 and has reached the state of Baja by now. About 2,000 kilometers of coastline have been hit, including the Abroljos region, a humpback whale haven and home to a world of unique coral reefs.
